LanguageData.VGE_OxygenCanister.label: oxygen canister
LanguageData.VGE_OxygenCanister.description: A life-sustaining gas. Used to pressurize rooms, supply breathable air, or fuel specialized equipment and survival gear. Volatile when damaged.
LanguageData.VGE_Astrofuel.label: astrofuel
LanguageData.VGE_Astrofuel.description: A high-energy synthetic fuel. Used to power gravship thrusters and boosters, or to generate electricity in specialized systems. Extremely combustible, it burns violently even in low-oxygen environments.
